altername_name: Kokoro ga Mezameru: Otoko-tachi no Nurie DS: Tamiya Box Art
name: Paint by DS: Military Vehicles
overview: Paint Military Vehicles DS. It was published by Ertain for NDS. You don't control the tanks and planes in this game... you paint them! Using the stylus, add color to a pencil sketch on the bottom screen while viewing a final drawing on the top screen. Then choose from oil paints, colored pencils or water color to put in the final details.
